Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2010 10:14AM amoccia53160 wrote: Get a second opinion.  Grade 3 is an aggressive cancer.  I would do the chemo and fight this with all that is available.  Do not take one doctors opinion.  You wouldn't have asked if you weren't questioning it yourself.  Go with your gut feeling.  xxoo Annette
